definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[מוֹת]]- 1Ch 24:22, 1Ch 24:22, 1Ch 26:26; [[מִית]]- v:1Ch 26:28, 1Ch 23:18; [[מות]]- 1Ch 26:25 Kt, [[מִית]]- Qr, Salwmwq, LXXL Salwmiq.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[מות]]- 1Ch 23:9 Kt, [[מִית]]- Qr, Alwqeim,. Salwm(e)iq.
[[מִית]]- son (appar.) of Rehob. 2Ch 11:20, Emmwq, A Salhmwq, LXXL Salwmiq.
[[מִית]]- head of post-ex. Family Ezr 8:10, Saleimouq, etc.
